posts.title: My First HTML Page
posts.body: Just created my first HTML page! It's simple but I'm proud of the structure I built with semantic elements.

posts.title: CSS Flexbox is Amazing
posts.body: Finally understood flexbox today. The way it handles layout is so much easier than what I expected!

posts.title: JavaScript Variables Confusion
posts.body: Can someone explain the difference between let, const, and var? I keep mixing them up in my code.

posts.title: Building My First React Component
posts.body: Created a simple button component today. The component-based thinking is starting to click!

posts.title: HTML Forms Best Practices
posts.body: Learned about proper form validation and accessibility features. Labels are more important than I thought!

posts.title: CSS Grid vs Flexbox
posts.body: When should I use Grid instead of Flexbox? Both seem to solve similar layout problems.

posts.title: JavaScript Arrays and Loops
posts.body: Practicing with for loops and array methods. The forEach method is becoming my favorite!

posts.title: React State Management Help
posts.body: useState is confusing me. How do I update state properly without causing infinite re-renders?
